nodes.documentation:
@dev Extension of {ERC777} that adds a set of accounts with the {MinterRole},
which have permission to mint (create) new tokens as they see fit.
nodes.name: ERC777Mintable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Creates `amount` tokens and assigns them to `account`, increasing
the total supply.
     * If a send hook is registered for `account`, the corresponding function
will be called with `operator`, `data` and `operatorData`.
     * See {IERC777Sender} and {IERC777Recipient}.
     * Emits {Minted} and {Transfer} events.
     * Requirements
     * - the caller must have the {MinterRole}.
- `account` cannot be the zero address.
- if `account` is a contract, it must implement the {IERC777Recipient}
interface.
nodes.name: mint

nodes.documentation: @dev Child contracts MAY overwrite this function to revert on unwanted calls.
nodes.name: _preValidateMinting
